BFG Repo-Cleaner ================ !CIhttps://github.com/rtyley/bfg-repo-cleaner/actions/workflows/ci.yml !Releasehttps://github.com/rtyley/bfg-repo-cleaner/actions/workflows/release.yml Removes large or troublesome blobs like git-filter-branch does, but faster - and written in Scala - Fund the BFG The BFG is a simpler, faster 10 - 720x faster alternative to for cleansing bad data out of your Git repository: Removing Crazy Big Files Removing Passwords, Credentials & other Private data Main documentation for The BFG is here : https://rtyley.github.io/bfg-repo-cleaner/
